## Vector4.FromArrayToRef() method

Updates the given vector "result" from the starting index of the given array.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static FromArrayToRef(array: ArrayLike<number>, offset: number, result: Vector4): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  array | <code>ArrayLike&lt;number&gt;</code> | the array to pull values from |
|  offset | <code>number</code> | the offset into the array to start at |
|  result | <code>Vector4</code> | the vector to store the result in |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
